mapper.insert: insert into TABLES (TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE, ENGINE, VERSION, ROW_FORMAT, TABLE_ROWS, AVG_ROW_LENGTH, DATA_LENGTH, MAX_DATA_LENGTH, INDEX_LENGTH, DATA_FREE, AUTO_INCREMENT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, TABLE_COLLATION, CHECKSUM, CREATE_OPTIONS, TABLE_COMMENT ) values (#{TABLE_CATALOG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TABLE_SCHEMA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TABLE_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TABLE_TYPE,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ENGINE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{VERSION,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ROW_FORMAT,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{TABLE_ROWS,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{AVG_ROW_LENGTH,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{DATA_LENGTH,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{MAX_DATA_LENGTH,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{INDEX_LENGTH,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{DATA_FREE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{AUTO_INCREMENT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{UPDATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{CHECK_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{TABLE_COLLATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CHECKSUM,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{CREATE_OPTIONS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TABLE_COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE, ENGINE, VERSION, ROW_FORMAT, TABLE_ROWS, AVG_ROW_LENGTH, DATA_LENGTH, MAX_DATA_LENGTH, INDEX_LENGTH, DATA_FREE, AUTO_INCREMENT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CHECK_TIME, TABLE_COLLATION, CHECKSUM, CREATE_OPTIONS, TABLE_COMMENT from TABLES
